articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital under Construction
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital under Construction
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital under construction.
					 He said that to provide the people with a modern general ophthalmic hospital was his longtime plan and desire.
					
					 After watching its layout and ground plan, he went round the hospital under construction to give instructions for it.
					
					 What is important in building the hospital is to ensure good interior and exterior construction so as to make the most of its characteristics as a multi-functional and general health service center even manufacturing glasses, he said.
					
					 He stressed the need to build outpatient and sick wards and glasses shop in keeping with the modern aesthetic taste and in favor of treatment of the patients and service activities.
					
					 He said that preparations should be made well in advance for smooth operation of the hospital while speeding up its construction.
					
					 The hospital should be built into the country's most developed ophthalmic one, he said, adding that the Party would be entirely responsible for the provision of modern medical equipment and various furnishings necessary for its operation.
					
					 He also said the Party would provide the sufficient material and technical means to the hospital's glasses shop so that it can manufacture glasses on the basis of scientific diagnosis and prescription and serve glasses of various types and functions according to the tastes, sex and age of citizens.
					
					 When the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital is built, we can say that we have built various kinds of modern medical service centers one by one every year recently, he noted, saying this is a powerful demonstration of the advantage of our socialist healthcare system in which the Party and the state take full responsibility for the life and health of the people. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the builders would successfully complete the construction of the hospital before Oct. 10, the founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Accompanying him were Department Director Kim Yong Su and Vice-Department Director Jo Yong Won of the WPK Central Committee and Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Ok Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Ok Sun
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Ok Sun, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, on Friday, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: KPA Supreme Command Releases Crucial Report
articles.content:
KPA Supreme Command Releases Crucial Report
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army released the following crucial report on Friday:
					 Today the south Korean puppet military gangsters committed such grave military provocation as intruding into the southwestern sea under our side's control and firing 40 mm rocket gun shells at our navy's ferryboat on a routine duty.
					
					 They started their premeditated military provocation by making three speedboats of the puppet navy's 2nd Fleet and a vessel of the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries sail 6.4 km across the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in sea waters west of Paekryong Island and southwest of Yonphyong Island four times between 05;53 to 07;20.
					
					 Our side gave several warnings, but they refused to withdraw their ships, asserting that they were on a routine duty in the waters under their control.
					
					 Then they fired in succession 40 mm rocket gun shells straight toward the ferryboat of our navy, which was pulling a wrecked boat in the waters under out side's control. The ferryboat is an unarmed vessel which is for mail delivery and liaison.
					
					 This reckless military provocation is the revelation of the south Korean puppet group's vicious intention and hackneyed trick to inveigle our side into a provocation case by driving the situation to an extreme phase and then let the reactionary media mislead the public opinion with propaganda that the case was provoked by our side.
					
					 The puppet military ran amuck to escalate the provocation, issuing an order to put its combat air division based in Suwon on standby for emergency sortie.
					
					 After all, the situation in those waters is inching to the unpredictable extreme phase.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation, the KPA units on the southwestern front are waiting for an order to launch an annihilating attack, ready for making retaliatory strikes.

articles.title: Congratulations to Austrian Federal President-elect
articles.content:
Congratulations to Austrian Federal President-elect
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Alexander Van der Bellen upon his election as federal president of Austria.
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Federal Chancellor of Austria
articles.content:
Greetings to Federal Chancellor of Austria
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on May 25 sent a congratulatory message to Christian Kern upon his appointment as federal chancellor of the Republic of Austria.
					 Pak wished the federal chancellor success in his work for the development of the country.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Mozambican Party Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets Mozambican Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), met and had a talk with the delegation of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party led by Secretary General Eliseu Joaquim Machava that paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 Choe Ryong Hae said he was pleased to see the successes being made by the Mozambique Liberation Front Party and people under the leadership of President Filipe Nwussi, chairman of the party, warmly welcoming the delegation to the DPRK.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il rendered material and moral assistance and support to the Mozambican people in their struggle for gaining independence and accomplish the cause of building a new society and Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK is paying great attention to developing the relations between the two countries true to the great leaders' noble will, he noted.
					
					 He expressed steadfast stand that the WPK would further develop the longstanding relations of friendship between the two parties and two countries.
					
					 Expressing deep thanks to the WPK Central Committee for cordially greeting and according hospitality to the delegation, Eliseu Joaquim Machava said that he was pleased with the development of the relations between the two parties and two countries.
					
					  He said he deeply felt about the wise guidance of the WPK dynamically arousing the popular masses to the work to develop political, economic and all other fields and bolster up the national defence capabilities through the reality of the DPRK where the revolutionary cause developed and led by the preceding leaders is being given steady continuity.
					
					 The two parties and two countries are fighting against the common enemy, he said, affirming the will to invariably boost the friendly relations with the WPK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mozambican President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mozambican President
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a gift from Mozambican President Filipe Nwussi, president of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party.
					 Secretary General of the party Eliseu Joaquim Machava who is heading the delegation of the party on a visit to the DPRK conveyed the gift to Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Friday.

articles.title: Mozambican Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Mozambican Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party led by Secretary General Eliseu Joaquim Machava left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 Officially Registered by UN
articles.content:
Satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 Officially Registered by UN
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK presented the UN with a document for registering a satellite as a signatory to the "Convention on Registration of Objects Launched into Outer Space" as it successfully launched its earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on Feb. 7, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Recently the UN Office for Outer Space Affairs worked out UN official document ST/SG/SER.E/768, the one related to the register of Kwangmyongsong-4, and posted it separately on websites.
					
					 The register of the DPRK's satellite conducted after going through legal procedures according to relevant international laws has thus been rounded off.
					
					 The DPRK's earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 launched according to the 2016 plan of the 5-year plan for national aerospace development is now going round the earth along its orbit.

articles.title: NECC Chairman Supports New Line and Policies on National Reunification
articles.content:
NECC Chairman Supports New Line and Policies on National Reunification
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Pang Kang Su, chairman of the National Economic Cooperation Committee (NECC), made public a statement on Friday in support of the Juche-oriented line and policies for national reunification advanced by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his historic report clarified the orientation and ways to build an independent and prosperous reunified power as desired by all Koreans as early as possible by holding high the banner of national independence and great national unity and struggling to ensure durable peace on the Korean peninsula and reunify the country by federal formula.
					
					Our nation proud of having a history spanning 5000 years and brilliant culture has stood in antagonism and confrontation, divided into the north and the south for over 70 years. Consequently, the uniform development of the national economy has been hindered and foreign forces are given the chance to fish in troubled waters. Such self-ruinous act is disgrace to the nation which can never be tolerated any longer.
					
					 Business persons in the north and the south desirous of national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification are called upon to turn out in the patriotic struggle for national reunification under the uplifted banner of national independence irrespective of thought and ism.
					
					 When reunified, our country will demonstrate its dignity and grandeur as a world power with 80 million population and enormous national power, a nation of advanced civilization capable of outpacing other countries in the world by dint of indomitable national spirit and unexcelled resourcefulness, and a nation of justice playing a leading role in ensuring peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Korean nation will build a prosperous reunified power on this land by dint of national independence and great national unity without fail, regarding the line and policies for national reunification as the unique supreme programme for the reunification of the nation.

articles.title: Participants in Trade Fair Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Trade Fair Visit Mangyongdae 
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 19th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday.
					 They laid bouquets in front of the old home of the President.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic life of his family members, they looked round the historical relics.
					
					 They went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also toured the International Friendship Exhibition House, the Sci-tech Complex, Panmunjom, etc.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Uruguayan Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Uruguayan Party Leader
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Ruben Maria Vera, chairperson of the March 26 Movement of Uruguay, on May 23.
					 The message extended the warmest congratulations of the Uruguayan people to Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, upon hearing the historic report made by him at the congress of the WPK at this time when the world was looking up to it as an invincible fortress illuminating the road of winning a fresh victory in the glorious struggle.
					
					 It also congratulated the 7th Congress of the WPK, expressing full support to the report made by Kim Jong Un and the activities of the WPK.
					
					 It wished him greater success.

articles.title: Danggui, Traditional Korean Medicinal Herb
articles.content:
Danggui, Traditional Korean Medicinal Herb
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Danggui (Angelica gigas), a traditional medicinal herb, helps produce blood, enhance circulation of blood, reduce inflammation and prevent damages from radiation.
					 According to Pak Hak Il, a section chief of the Radioactive Rays Medicine Institute under the Academy of Medical Science, danggui, a perennial of parsley family, has been considered from long ago to be efficacious for debility, chronic consumption, women's disease and other diseases. 
					
					 Now the medicines made of danggui are believed in many countries to be essential ones for human health.
					
					 The institute has recently developed haematic compound drug with ferulic acid, an ingredient of danggui, as material and confirmed its medicinal effect.
					
					 The drug helps activate haematic function of the people who are affected by electromagnetic waves and radioactive rays.
					
					 The drug also improves immunity after surgical operation and childbirth and is good for nervous breakdown.

articles.title: Magnolia Blossom, DPRK's National Flower
articles.content:
Magnolia Blossom, DPRK's National Flower
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Magnolias are in full blossom on Moran Hill in Pyongyang.
					 Thanks to the ardent patriotism of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, magnolia blossom has been regarded as a flower symbolic of the nation. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime liked the magnolia blossom best of all flowers and saw to it that the flower was called Mokran.
					
					 He said Mokran seems to represent the sagacity of the Korean nation and designated the flower as the national flower of the DPRK.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il ensured that Mokran, liked so much by Kim Il Sung, spread throughout the country.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un took measures to plant the Mokran trees in a massive way.
					
					 The DPRK people are cultivating the Mokran trees in significant places, including the areas of Mangyongdae and the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and revolutionary sites.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Practical Proposal for Radically Improving North-South Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Practical Proposal for Radically Improving North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- To defuse military tensions is the basic condition for creating the atmosphere of confidence and improving the north-south relations, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The Korean peninsula is the hottest spot in the world incomparable with any region in the light of acute military standoff and density of armed forces deployment, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 In order to save the Koreans from the danger of war and make a new breakthrough in improved inter-Korean relations and national reunification, it is necessary to defuse military tensions without delay.
					
					 What is the most important is for the north and the south to take practical steps for defusing military tensions and reducing the danger of clash in the area along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) and the hotspot in the West Sea.
					
					 The north and the south should expand the scope of steps for defusing military confrontation and tension and preventing clash, depending on the creation of the atmosphere of military confidence.
					
					 Dialogue and negotiations are the basic ways of settling the issues arising in the inter-Korean relations according to the desire and will of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 In order to achieve peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula, it is, first of all, necessary to hold dialogue and negotiations between the military authorities of the north and the south. If the north-south military authorities' talks are to be open, they will be able to seek a negotiated settlement of a package of issues of mutual concern including the issues of defusing the danger of clash and easing tensions in the area along the MDL.
					
					 Now is the time for the north and the south to work hard for detente and peace on the basis of the practical proposal for improving the relations.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have the true willingness to improve the north-south relations, they should not seek a sinister purpose any longer but come out for dialogue and negotiations with a sincere and honest attitude.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand and will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to improve the north-south relations through dialogue and negotiations, not by confrontation and war, and achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Songun Politics Is Basic Political Mode of Kim Jong Il's Style under Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Politics Is Basic Political Mode of Kim Jong Il's Style under Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Songun politics is the most powerful basic political mode under socialism in our times that goes only by the august name of leader Kim Jong Il, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Songun politics is the basic political mode under socialism with the revolutionary idea of Kim Jong Il as its ideological and theoretical basis.
					
					 His Songun idea indicates the revolutionary theory on bolstering up arms, consolidating the driving force of the revolution with the revolutionary army as the core and triumphantly advancing the revolution and construction by relying on it.
					
					 Songun politics is based on the great revolutionary idea giving scientific and practical answers to vital issues of winning the victory of the revolution and it, therefore, serves as the most powerful basic political mode under socialism in our times.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit is the noble revolutionary one symbolizing and representing the great Songun era and the most revolutionary and militant ideological and moral weapon for working miracles and performing feats in the revolution and construction. The characteristics of Songun politics and its tremendous might lie in that it is firmly based on this great revolutionary spirit.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that the Socialist Constitution codifying the idea and principle of the Songun revolution was adopted to consolidate the achievements of the Songun leadership and apply the Songun politics to all fields. The state machinery which newly stipulates the position and authority of the National Defence Commission was legally set up, providing a sure legal guarantee for Songun politics.
					
					 It is the great honor and pride of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to live and struggle in the country guided by the Songun idea, Songun politics shining with the august name and exploits of Kim Jong Il, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Moves to Emerge Military Giant
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Japan conducted a test-flight of a new home-made fighter jet recently. Stealth technology was introduced into the fighter jet called the fifth-generation one and Japan reportedly started its development in the middle of the first decade of the 21st century. 
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says:
					
					 The test-flight revealed once again the wild ambition of Japan to emerge a military giant.
					
					 The successive governments of Japan have spurred the projects for bolstering up and modernizing its air force.
					
					 Aware of the efficiency of air strikes in wars of aggression before any other countries, Japan had put spurs to manufacturing war planes such as fighters and bombers while building warships by taking advantage of its booming industry since the "1868 Meiji Restoration." The Japanese imperialists launched the blitz on Pearl Harbor with fighter bombers and this became a prelude to the Pacific War.
					
					 Since the end of the Second World War, it has bolstered up its Air "Self-Defense Force" by reviving its military air industry and lavished funds on buying various type fighter jets from the U.S.
					
					 It is the scenario of Japan to ignite a surprise war of aggression and carry out its blitz tactics by dint of its air force.
					
					 What merits particular attention is that Japan opted for independently modernizing its arms and equipment. This means Japan is confident of its potential acquired in the decades-long course of turning itself into a military giant. In another word, Japan is mulling increasing its own capability for executing a war of aggression, without being dependent and subject to the U.S. Japan's ulterior design is to round off the preparations for launching overseas invasion single-handed any moment.
					
					 The revival of Japanese militarism would only mean a starting point in going to its final ruin, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Violence Continues in S. Korean Army
articles.content:
Violence Continues in S. Korean Army
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Brutal acts continue in the south Korean army, sparking off public uproar, according to KBS.
					 It was disclosed that a first lieutenant of a unit in areas along the Military Demarcation Line had beaten and maltreated a senior private under him from March to July last year.
					
					 In 2014 he also forced another soldier to chin on the wet floor after binding his hands and feet, a serious human rights abuse.
					
					 The crimes committed by the officer on active duty raises skepticism about the assurances of the top military officers that they would prevent violence in the army.

articles.title: Lifting of "May 24 Step" Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lifting of "May 24 Step" Demanded in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Members of Headquarters of the Movement for Reunified Korean Nation staged a demo one by one across south Korea, urging the south Korean authorities to lift the "May 24 step" six years since the step was taken.
					 The demos were staged in more than 40 places such as Kwanghwamun of Seoul and before the buildings of the "government" and "National Assembly" and in Pusan, Taejon, Ulsan, North Kyongsang and South Kyongsang provinces.
					
					 They said that only when the south and the north cooperate with each other is it possible to develop economy and ensure peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The "government" should roll back its confrontational policy and opt for dialogue with the north, they stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Posts Articles Praising Great Man on Websites
articles.content:
S. Korean Posts Articles Praising Great Man on Websites 
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A south Korean had posted on websites many articles praising the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung from 2009 to November last year, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 In the articles he highly praised the noble personality of Kim Il Sung as a great man, saying he was the great man possessed of the steadfast communist idea and the Juche idea.
					
					 He also posted articles exposing the U.S. imperialists' policy of colonial enslavement and the illegality of their military presence in south Korea and calling for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 The prosecution authorities arrested him on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" and are persecuting him, but he is not abandoning his faith, declaring that he could not recognize the "Security Law" but continue posting such articles.

articles.title: UN Bodies Urged to Positively Move for Repatriation of DPRK Abductees
articles.content:
UN Bodies Urged to Positively Move for Repatriation of DPRK Abductees
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Organizations including the "Christian Pastors' Group for Peaceful Action" and the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy, religionists, literary men and other people of different circles in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Wednesday, demanding the repatriation of 12 women employees of the DPRK who were taken to south Korea by its authorities' allurement and abduction operation, according to south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 The speakers said that they were forcibly taken to south Korea and there is a suspicion of death among them but no investigation has been made to probe the truth.
					
					 Noting that possibility of abduction seems to increase in the light of the authorities' attitude, they called for allowing immediate face-to-face meeting with them.
					
					 If Chongwadae and the Intelligence Service keep mum and connive at the case, this will prove the falsity of their loudmouthed "human rights issue in the north", they stressed.
					
					 They urged the UN bodies to actively come out for probing the truth behind the case and ensure the repatriation of the abductees.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Send Back Abductees to North
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Send Back Abductees to North
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Thursday made public a statement denouncing the south Korean authorities for their thrice-cursed abduction of citizens of the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that the south Korean authorities are keeping the group of abductees of the north in custody though more than 50 days passed since they were lured and taken to south Korea.
					
					 Noting that the south Korean authorities are detaining the abductees in separate confinement and keeping them away from any contact with outside so that they may not be known to public, while forcing them to "defect to the south," the statement went on:
					
					 Managers of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification and Koreans in Japan bitterly denounce the inhumane and traitorous acts of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should take every possible measure to ensure face-to-face meeting of the abductees with their parents, though belatedly, and make an apology for the unprecedented group abduction and send back them to the north without delay, as demanded by their families.

articles.title: Ethiopian Youth Organization Condemns S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Ethiopian Youth Organization Condemns S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia on May 17 made public a statement in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' abduction of the DPRK citizens.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The association can hardly repress resentment at the heinous abduction of the DPRK citizens by the south Korean authorities in daylight in April.
					
					 This is a serious politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and a hideous crime violating human rights.
					
					 The south Korean authorities turn down the request of the families of the abductees for face-to-face meeting with their daughters and detain the abductees in solitary cells to keep them away from contact.
					
					 The association denounces the south Korean authorities' inhuman act as a crime violating the elementary human rights. 
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities send the DPRK citizens back to the folds of their families as soon as possible and make an apology.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Blame South Korean Authorities' Inhuman Act
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Blame South Korean Authorities' Inhuman Act
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on May 16 released a joint statement to censure the south Korean puppet forces for alluring and abducting a group of DPRK citizens.
					 The south Korean authorities refuse to repatriate the DPRK citizens they abducted to south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 They even turn down the request of the families of the abductees.
					
					 These are, indeed, rash acts against humanity.
					
					 This abduction is politically motivated from A to Z.
					
					 The south Korean authorities confine the DPRK citizens in solitary cells and keep them away from media in violation of the World Declaration of Human Rights and the relevant international convention on human rights.
					
					 The UN human rights organizations under the control of the U.S. and the West are keeping mum about the south Korean authorities' human rights abuses.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are a group of traitors as they don't respond to the steps the DPRK had taken in good faith out of generosity but detain the DPRK citizens by force.
					
					 All these facts eloquently prove that south Korea is a veritable hell on the earth.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities immediately send back the DPRK citizens.

articles.title: 7th Congress of WPK Celebrated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
7th Congress of WPK Celebrated in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Dakha, Bangladesh on May 21 to celebrate the successful 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing their exploits.
					
					 Present there were the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, member of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and other figures of political parties, organizations, groups for the study of the Juche idea and media.
					
					 Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, MD. Harun－Ar－Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, and other figures made speeches.
					
					 Speakers said that they extended warm congratulations to the WPK and all the people of the DPRK on the successful 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 They noted that supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK reflected the unanimous will and desire of the Korean people and world progressives.
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people would win brilliant victory in the historic struggle toward the final victory, faithfully upholding the idea and line advanced by Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the WPK, they stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, hizo recorrido por el campo de construccion de nuevo Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong.
					Dijo que la edificacion de una moderna policlinica de oftalmologia para el pueblo fue su proyecto concebido desde hace mucho tiempo y un trabajo que queria hacer infaliblemente.
					
					Luego de ver un mapa de disposicion y plano del hospital, recorrio el campo de construccion donde dio las instrucciones para la obra.
					
					Senalo que lo importante en la obra es construir bien las partes interior y exterior mostrando bien las caracteristicas del hospital especializado en la curacion oftalmologica y, al mismo tiempo, de la base de servicio medico multifuncional y combinada que ofrece hasta el servicio de elaboracion de gafas.
					
					Subrayo que los pabellones para los pacientes externo y los hospitalizados y la tienda de gafas deben ser construidos favorablemente para el tratamiento de los enfermos y las actividades de servicio.
					
					Hizo hincapie en la necesidad de hacer con escrupulosidad  desde ahora los preparativos para gestionar bien el hospital, ademas de acelerar la construccion.
					
					Agrego que hay que construirlo como un especializado en oftalmologia mas desarrollado en nuestro pais y anadio que el partido solucionara con responsabilidad todos los modernos equipos medicos y otros necesarios para la gestion del hospital.
					
					Destaco que enviara a la tienda de gafas del hospital los medios materiales y tecnicos con los que no solo pueden fabricar las gafas segun el diagnosis y recetas cientificos, sino tambien pueden ofrecer los anteojos de diversas formas y funciones conforme al gusto, el sexo y las caracteristicas por edad de las personas.
					
					Dijo que si se construye hasta este hospital podemos hablar que en los ultimos anos hemos construido cada ano las modernas bases de servicio medico de diversas formas y anadio que esto sirve de una vivida manifestacion de la superioridad del regimen de la salud publica socialista de nuestro pais en que el partido y el Estado se responsabilizan enteramente y cuidan de la vida y la salud del pueblo.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los constructores terminaran excelentemente esta obra antes del 10 de octubre, dia de fundacion del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Su, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won y el director del Departamento de Diseno del CDN, Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Kim Ok Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Kim Ok Sun
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 27 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Kim Ok Sun, ex combatiente revolucionaria antijaponesa, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Informacion importante de Comandancia Suprema del EPC
articles.content:
Informacion importante de Comandancia Suprema del EPC
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 27 la siguiente informacion importante:
					El dia 27, los gangsteres del ejercito titere del Sur de Corea infiltraron en el area maritima de la parte sudoeste de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y cometieron una grave provocacion militar de disparar con la ametralladora pesada de 40 mm de calibre contra el trasbordador de las fuerzas navales de nuestro ejercito que estaba cumpliendo su deber normal.
					
					Ellos iniciaron la premeditada provocacion militar haciendo infiltrar en 4 ocasiones desde las 5 y 53 minutos hasta las 7 y 20 minutos las 3 lanchas rapidas dependientes a la segunda flota surcoreana y un barco pesquero perteneciente al Ministerio de Pesca Maritima titere hasta 6.4km atravesando la linea maritima de demarcacion militar de nuestro ejercito al oeste de la isla Paekryong y al sudoeste de la isla Yonphyong.
					
					A pesar de nuestras reiteradas advertencias, los gangsteres militares surcoreanos no retiraron sus buques insistiendo descaradamente en que estan de guardia normal en sus aguas jurisdiccionales.
					
					Luego, ellos cometieron una imperdonable accion militar de disparar a rafaga con la ametralladora pesada contra el barco de enlace de las fuerzas navales de nuestro ejercito que estaba en regreso remolcando un barco pesquero de economia suplementaria, naufragado en nuestras aguas.
					
					Nuestro trasbordador, que fue el blanco de disparo de los titeres, era un barco sin armas que cumple la mision del envio de correo y el deber de enlace.
					
					La presente provocacion militar imprudente deviene un habitual metodo para introducir la RPDC en sus provocaciones llevando a la extremidad la situacion y demuestra la mala intencion de los titeres surcoreanos de describirlo como provocacion del Norte por medio de los medios de prensa reaccionarios.
					
					Inmediatamente despues de perpetrar esta provocacion maritima, la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea dio orden de entrar en la disposicion emergente de salida a la aviacion de combate en la base aerea de Suwon para ampliarla mas.
					
					Asi, la situacion de esa zona maritima esta en visperas de explosion imprevisible.
					
					Frente a tal situacion creada, las unidades del frente sudoeste del EPC, dispuestas de combate de represalia, estan esperando la orden de ataque demoledor.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de presidente mozambiqueno
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de presidente mozambiqueno
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea recibio regalo que le enviara Filipe Nwussi, presidente del Partido Frente de Liberacion de Mozambique y presidente de la Republica de Mozambique. 
					El secretario general del Partido FRELIMO, Eliseu Joaquim Machava, quien preside la delegacion de visita en Corea, lo entrego el dia 27 a Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
